tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE public_meetings (
  meeting_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  meeting_date DATE NOT NULL,
  meeting_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  attendees TEXT[],
  notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE hearings (
  hearing_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  hearing_date DATE NOT NULL,
  hearing_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  case_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  attendees TEXT[],
  recording_url VARCHAR(255),
  notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE meetings (
  meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  meeting_date DATE,
  meeting_time TIME,
  meeting_location VARCHAR(255),
  meeting_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE attendees (
  attendee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  meeting_id INT,
  attendee_name VARCHAR(255),
  attendee_email VARCHAR(255),
  attendee_phone VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE agenda_items (
  agenda_item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  meeting_id INT,
  agenda_item_title VARCHAR(255),
  agenda_item_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE public_meetings (
  meeting_id          SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  meeting_date        DATE,
  meeting_time        TIME,
  meeting_location    VARCHAR(255),
  meeting_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE meeting_attendees (
  attendee_id     SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  attendee_name   VARCHAR(255),
  attendee_email  VARCHAR(255),
  attendee_status BOOLEAN,
  meeting_id      INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES public_meetings (meeting_id)
)

CREATE TABLE meeting_agenda (
  agenda_id        SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  agenda_item      VARCHAR(255),
  agenda_duration  INTERVAL,
  meeting_id       INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES public_meetings (meeting_id)
)

CREATE TABLE meeting_feedback (
  feedback_id    SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  feedback_text  TEXT,
  meeting_id     INT,
  attendee_id    INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES public_meetings (meeting_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (attendee_id) REFERENCES meeting_attendees (attendee_id)
)

CREATE TABLE meeting_documents (
  document_id      SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  document_name    VARCHAR(255),
  document_type    VARCHAR(100),
  document_path    VARCHAR(255),
  meeting_id       INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES public_meetings (meeting_id)
)
